subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Jets turned to an unlikely source — a coach they had fired — for help trading up to the fifth overall pick in the N.F.L. draft and selecting Mark Sanchez as their latest quarterback of the future.
snippet: The Jets turned to an unlikely source — a coach they had fired — for help trading up to the fifth overall pick in the N.F.L. draft and selecting Mark Sanchez as their latest quarterback of the future.
